CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 25, 1964, pg. 1, reads: "Bigots Scare Woman, 75, From Peaceful Fishing - Object of Hate - After ignoring derogatory remarks by young whites as she and two friends were fishing in a North Hills lake, 75-year-old Mrs. Mary Reid of 7911 Madeira St., said she returned to her car to find the above homemade signs plastered on the vehicle. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Threatening notes with swastikas and American Nazi Party propaganda left on car belonging to Mary Reid
